FuncDef:
The description command configures the description for an MPAC policy.
The undo description command cancels the configuration.
By default, no description is configured for an MPAC policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description for an MPAC policy.
The value is string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters with spaces.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the description for an MPAC policy that has been created, run the description command. Configuring a description for an MPAC policy facilitates management over multiple MPAC policies.
Prerequisites
An MPAC policy has been created using the service-security policy command.
